description: Nutritional specifications for Ross 308 broilers based on different target live weights.

stages.key_notes: Feed specifications should be used as a guide only; adjustments may be necessary for local conditions, legislation and markets [14]. A withdrawal feed should be fed to meet local requirements for medication withdrawal times and can be formulated to the same standards as the final feed listed [14].

description: Nutritional specifications for Cobb 500 broilers based on market segments.

stages.key_notes: Balanced Digestible Amino Acid Ratio to Lysine (100%) specified [12].

Balanced Digestible Amino Acid Ratio to Lysine (100%) specified [12].
Balanced Digestible Amino Acid Ratio to Lysine (100%) specified [12]. Should withdrawal feed be required, use same finisher specifications [10].

Balanced Digestible Amino Acid Ratio to Lysine (100%) specified as: Methionine 38%, Methionine + Cystine 75%, Tryptophan 16%, Threonine 68%, Arginine 108%, Valine 76%, Isoleucine 64%, Leucine 110% [9].
